description: This is the first global map of mangrove extent produced using an automated, reproducible, and globally consistent methodology, using a combination of optical and radar satellite data.
title: Mangrove Forests
citation: Bunting, P., Rosenqvist, A., Lucas, R. M., Rebelo, L. M., Hilarides, L., Thomas, N., Hardy, A., Itoh, T., Shimada, M., & Finlayson, C. M. (2018). The global mangrove watch - A new 2010 global baseline of mangrove extent. Remote Sensing, 10(10). https://doi.org/10.3390/rs10101669. Accessed through Resource Watch, (26 April, 2022). www.resourcewatch.org.
